div.class: col-lg-offset-3 col-lg-6 col-md-offset-2 col-md-8 col-sm-offset-1 col-sm-10 col-xs-12

div.t-attf-class: form-group #{error and 'name' in error and 'has-error' or ''}

input.name: name
input.title: Search for state, city or zone
input.placeholder: Search for state, city or zone

button.class: btn btn-default btn-block ladda-button waves-effect waves-light
btn btn-primary btn-block ladda-button waves-effect waves-light
